snippet.title: LONESTAR 1.0 launches on April 3rd with a third new ship and tons of new content!
snippet.description:
Turn-based strategic #roguelike deckbuilder LONESTAR 1.0 Launching on April 3rd on #steam, #epicgamestore and #nintendoswitch! 

PLAY NOW👉 https://store.steampowered.com/app/2056210/LONESTAR/

NEW UPDATE:
- “Spectra” Spaceship– A cutting-edge vessel equipped with advanced modular slots, empowering players to tailor their strategies with precision.
- Expanded Crew – Recruit 13 new bounty hunters with unique skills—more reinforcements are on the way to keep your lineup fresh and formidable.
- Intensified Gameplay – Dive into Advanced Mode with over 130 random events and tougher challenges, culminating in an epic final boss showdown.
- Enhanced Customization – Upgrade your ship with 85 new units and uncover 90+ new treasures that amplify LONESTAR’s signature “number-difference” combat system.
- Multi-Platform Play – Now fully optimized for Steam Deck and available on Nintendo eShop, ensuring an immersive experience wherever you play.
- Community & Support – Benefit from integrated workshop features, an official wiki, and multilingual support (Simplified/Traditional Chinese, English, Japanese, and more) to connect with bounty hunters worldwide.

#indiegame #gaming #steamgames
